item.title: First post
item.description: Describe a model: The first step is to create a simulated dataset, which mimics real transitions for an undergraduate student. The next step is to simulate the chances of moving on. Id Semester NumberSemester ProbOfMovingOn MovedOn CurrentSemester FutureSemester 1 F 1 0.4669271 1 F1 W1 1 W 1 0.1957885 1 W1 F2 1 F 2 0.6904683 1 F2 W2 1 W 2 0.
